propel.core.security.cryptography.ciphers

Class AbstractCipherEcb

  • java.lang.Object
    • propel.core.security.cryptography.ciphers.AbstractCipherEcb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICipher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AESCipherEcb, BlowfishCipherEcb, XTEACipherEcb

    public abstract class AbstractCipherEcb
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICipher
    Provides common functionality across all ciphers

      • encrypt

        public abstract void encrypt(byte[] dataIn,
           byte[] dataOut,
           int offset,
           int count)
        Encrypts the provided in data from the offset and puts it in the out data array at the offset. Does this for a specified byte count, which must be a multiple of the cipher's block size.
        Specified by:
        encrypt in interface ICipher

      • decrypt

        public abstract void decrypt(byte[] dataIn,
           byte[] dataOut,
           int offset,
           int count)
        Decrypts the provided in data from the offset and puts it in the out data array at the offset. Does this for a specified byte count, which must be a multiple of the cipher's block size.
        Specified by:
        decrypt in interface ICipher
